The easiest way to get the data for this project is to download or fork the repo for this project [https://github.com/CrumpLab/EntropyTyping](https://github.com/CrumpLab/EntropyTyping)

The raw data in a zip file is [https://github.com/CrumpLab/EntropyTyping/raw/master/mturk.txt.zip](https://github.com/CrumpLab/EntropyTyping/raw/master/mturk.txt.zip)

This page will be updated with a more complete description of the data file.
